main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright, circular, metallic object in the sky in Marysville, Ohio, which changed color from white to yellowish-orange and stayed visible for about 15 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright light and made abrupt changes in its flight path, indicating possible intelligent control.
The witness was unable to estimate the size or altitude of the object.
Similar sightings were reported in Jerome, Ohio, and Wheelersburg, Ohio, on the same date by multiple witnesses.
The object was seen moving at a high rate of speed, appearing to be under intelligent control.
A similar fall of angel hair, resembling fluffy, cotton-like stuff, was observed near a school in Marysville, Ohio, at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: bright, circular, metallic object with changing colors
location: Marysville, Ohio, Jerome, Ohio, Wheelersburg, Ohio
